channel.title: DNAC on Technology Blog Wim
channel.description: Recent content in DNAC on Technology Blog Wim

item.title: Cisco DNA Center - Sites
item.description: Introduction In previous posts, we already looked at how to retrieve information from the devices or from the client API. We’ll now look a bit into the Sites API.

item.title: Cisco DNA Center - Assurance
item.description: Introduction In this post we introduced DNAC from a theoretical point of view. We continued in this post with looking at some simple Python scripts to retrieve device related information from DNAC.

item.title: Cisco DNA Center - Devices
item.description: Introduction In this post, we introduced DNAC at a fairly high level and we have shown some POSTMAN samples to get a basic understanding of some of the APIs like authentication and devices).

item.title: Cisco DNA Center - Getting Started
item.description: What is Cisco DNA Cisco DNA is Ciscoâ€™s architecture for enterprise networks. It provides an open, extensible, and software-driven approach that makes the network simpler to manage and more agile and responsive to business needs.
